bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with zao jie 燥結 , dryness nodes. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry zao 棗 qotes Ren zhai zhi zhi fang 仁齋直指方 : 大便燥塞，大棗一枚去核，入輕粉半錢縛定，煨熟食之，仍以棗 湯送下 , “When the stools are dry and blocked up , take one piece of da zao and discard the kernel. Insert one half of a qian of qing fen into it and close tightly. Cook over a slow fire until done. Then swallow with a decoction with zao ”.
